General.Name: Ningbo Fubang
General.Description: Ningbo Fubang Jingye Group Co., Ltd engages in the production, processing, and sale of industrial aluminum profiles in China and internationally. It also trades in aluminum casting rods. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Huatong Transportation Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.
